page.title: 10Childs view
page.content: My Daddy works for Kodak in Hemel Hempstead,and my Mummy works in Aylesbury.They both go to work by car.I have a younger brother.We go to school in Ivinghoe by coach.I go to Ballet and swimming in Tring,Gym in Aylesbury and piano lessons in Pitstone after school.I sing in the Church choir and helped serve on the stalls at the Church Flower Festival. My friends and I make up plays and shows and make scent.We ride on our bikes.Ian plays cricket and football. The boys play soldiers, Starwars and Lego. In the holidays we go to London, Whipsnade Zoo,Aylesbury, Tring Museum, Hampton Court,Windsor , and to my Grandparents in Monmouth.My other Grandparents live in Kent.We stayed in a caravan in Devon. We walk round the reservoirs and lanes and we saw some piglets being born.Joanne age 9
